verses.roman:
kṛṣṇera saundarya-mādhurya yabe paḍe, śune
premete vihvala tabe, kichui nā jāne

synonyms: kṛṣṇera—of Kṛṣṇa; saundarya—beauty; mādhurya—sweetness; yabe—when; paḍe—recites; śune—hears; premete—in ecstatic love of Kṛṣṇa; vihvala—overwhelmed; tabe—then; kichui—anything; nā jāne—does not know.
translation: When he recited or heard about the beauty and sweetness of Kṛṣṇa, he would be overwhelmed with ecstatic love and become oblivious to everything.
